name: Motor Rush:Road Master
description:
Motor Rush:Road Master is a competitively racing game with countless unique characteristics, providing you with supreme realistic graphics and sound effects.
The most unique element you cannot miss out is the Confrontation design in Motor Rush!
You can use your fists, feet, and weapons to attack your opponents so as to make him fall behind you, in the same way,opponents may badly attack you as well!
Especially if you meet a quite strong opponent, you can powerly kick him with feets or punch him with a stick even a pan!
Don't you think it's hilarious? but be careful, if they hit you a few times, it's GAMEOVER！

Privacy Policy: https://www.gamesuion.com/PrivacyPolicy.html
